p: The viability of RAW264.7 cells was not significantly altered by a 24-h incubation of up to 50 μg/mL of DCEO in the presence of 100 ng/mL of LPS ( Figure 1A). Concentrations of DCEO of 12.5, 25, and 50 μg/mL were used in subsequent experiments. As shown in Figure 1B and C, significant increases in NO and PGE2 resulting from LPS stimulation in RAW264.7 cells were suppressed by DCEO treatment in a dose-dependent manner.
